posts.post_title: FS N28 Allen & Ginter Mike Kelly
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have an N28 Allen & Ginter Mike Kelly for sale. The price is $700, which includes insured shipping. The card is in a nice VG+/VG-Ex condition. For payment, I would like a US Postal money order or a check, no PayPal. You can contact me at [url]cyrilp@comcast.net[/url].

Here are scans of the front and back.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/allenginter/picsb/28-008b.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/allenginter/picsb/28-008rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
